page.title: 19Codnor People at Work
page.content: Most people from Codnor have to travel to surrounding towns to work although some do work in Codnor in shops or on the industrial estate. A survey of parents of children in the Junior School showed these to be the most popular occupations: {Factory workers 31 {Self-employed 15 {Office workers 14 {Shop workers 12 { Unemployed 11 {Engineers 9 {Garage workers 7 {Bank workers 6 {Pub and bar staff 6 {Builders 5 {Bus drivers 5 {Miners 5 39 parents were employed in 15 other occupations. Not included in the figures are full-time housewives.
